response:
I'm happy to help! As your boyfriend, I'll choose between girlfriend and husband for each phrase. Here's my response:

call you names - not my girlfriend
give you angry looks - not my girlfriend
put down your friends - not my girlfriend
say things to scare you - not my girlfriend
make you do something embarrassing - not my girlfriend
encourage you to open up - my girlfriend
open to your ideas - my girlfriend
excited to see you - my girlfriend
listen attentively to you - my girlfriend
make an effort with your family - my girlfriend

Let me know if there's anything else I can help with, babe!
